txt.en: 'Our brothers in Evendim are planning some kind of offensive to re-take the city of Annúminas, but they know that this will leave them too short-handed to deal with the near-constant raids by the bands of tomb-robbers who wander the Fields of Evendim and the eastern Twilight Hills.\n\n'They have asked me to send what warriors I can spare to help hunt down these bands of brigands and make sure that they cannot interfere with the efforts of the Wardens over the next month or so.'

'The Wardens of Annúminas have asked me to thank you for your efforts in fighting off the tomb-robbers in Evendim, and so I do, [placeholder]. May your blade continue to shine brightly in the face of darkness.'
Handarod is concerned with the bands of tomb-robbers who creep throughout the Fields of Evendim and the eastern region of the Twilight Hills in Evendim.
Defeated tomb-robbers in the Fields of Evendim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat tomb-robbers in the Fields of Evendim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Tomb-robbers can be found throughout the eastern and north-easten regions of Evendim, far to the west of Esteldín.\n\nHandarod has asked you to defeat tomb-robbers in Evendim.
Handarod is at Esteldín, far to the east of Evendim.\n\nYou should return to Handarod and tell him of your battles with the tomb-robbers.
